CONTOUR® NEXT ONE Blood Glucose Monitoring System
CONTOUR® NEXT EZ Blood Glucose Monitoring System
CONTOUR® NEXT LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CONTOUR® NEXT USB Blood Glucose Meter
CONTOUR® NEXT ONE Blood Glucose Meter
CONTOUR® NEXT EZ Blood Glucose Meter

Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CONTOUR NEXT series blood glucose monitoring systems and test strips with new alternative packaging configuration
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for OTC quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood by persons with diabetes at home for single-patient use only, not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or for use on neonates
